sections.heading: improvement; furnishing labor or material; falsifying certificate that equipment has been assessed; violation; penalty
sections.text: Any person, partnership, limited liability company, association, or corporation falsifying any statement required by section 77-1323 shall be guilty of a Class IV misdemeanor.Source

77-1324.Public improvement; furnishing labor or material; falsifying certificate that equipment has been assessed; violation; penalty.

Any person, partnership, limited liability company, association, or corporation falsifying any statement required by section 77-1323 shall be guilty of a Class IV misdemeanor.

SourceLaws 1963, c. 436, ยง 2, p. 1453;Laws 1977, LB 39, ยง 223;Laws 1993, LB 121, ยง 497.
